text: jis din tum use dekh loge to har doodh pilaane vaalee (dar ke maare) apane doodh peete (bachche) ko bhool jaayegee aur saaree haamala aurate apane-apane hamal (behisht se) gira degee aur (ghabaraahat mein) log tujhe matavaale maaloom honge haalaanki vah matavaale nahin hain balki khuda ka azaab bahut sakht hai ki log badahavaas ho rahe hain
